findings.title: Read access to pod's service account token
findings.description: Accessing the pod service account token gives an attacker the option to use the server API

findings.title: CAP_NET_RAW Enabled
findings.description:
CAP_NET_RAW is enabled by default for pods.
    If an attacker manages to compromise a pod,
    they could potentially take advantage of this capability to perform network
    attacks on other pods running on the same node

findings.title: Access to pod's secrets
findings.description: Accessing the pod's secrets within a compromised pod might disclose valuable data to a potential attacker
